ygData.subject: KoS list
ygData.msgSnippet: I know some might think this may be a spoiler of sorts, but anyone interested in making a list of NPC s that KoS SK s? I know that factions play a role in some
ygData.messageBody:
I know some might think this may be a spoiler of sorts, but anyone
interested in making a list of NPC's that KoS SK's? I know that factions
play a role in some SK's getting killed by a NPC, but there are some
that will kill us immediately no matter what we do.
The only reason why I personally do not feel this a spoiler is
because of this simple reason. If this were a real world (and when I am
playing, I guess it is) I would definitely think that SK's would have
some sort of network to relay this exact type of info. Also, NPC's can
see us through walls, so if I would have known that the 1st inn in
Western Karanas had an Innkeeper that will kill me immediately, I would
have given it a little wider distance :).
I know that /con is a great way to tell if someone will kill you if
you make contact, but sometimes that is not possible i.e. in the middle
of a fight. If I could just see the name of an NPC strolling towards me
while I am engaged in combat, I would have a little more time to create
some distance. Just as I do whenever a Griff or Giant comes a little to
close to a confrontation I may be having with a band of couple bandits.

Anyway, comments? bad idea? good idea?

Reanin 14th level Human SK
Cazic Thule
